name: ScriptUIGraphics

properties.name: backgroundColor
properties.description: The background color for containers; for non-containers, the parent background color.

properties.name: disabledBackgroundColor
properties.description: The background color for containers when disabled or inactive; for non-containers, the parent background color.

properties.name: disabledForegroundColor
properties.description: The text color when the element is disabled or inactive.

properties.name: font
properties.description: The default font to use for displaying text.

properties.name: currentPath
properties.description: The current drawing path, encapsulated in a path object.

properties.name: currentPoint
properties.description: The current position in the current drawing path.

methods.name: newBrush
methods.description: Creates a new painting brush object.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The brush type, solid or theme.

parameters.name: color
parameters.description: The brush color.

methods.name: newPen
methods.description: Creates a new drawing pen object.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The pen type, solid or theme.

parameters.name: color
parameters.description: The pen color.

parameters.name: width
parameters.description: The width of the pen line in pixels.

methods.name: newPath
methods.description: Creates a new, empty path object.

parameters.name: x

parameters.name: y

methods.name: fillPath

methods.name: drawFocusRing
methods.description: Draws a focus ring within a region of this element.

parameters.name: left
parameters.description: The left coordinate of the region.

parameters.name: top
parameters.description: The top coordinate of the region.

parameters.name: width
parameters.description: The width of the region in pixels.

parameters.name: height
parameters.description: The height of the region in pixels.

methods.name: drawImage
methods.description: Draws an image within a given region of the element.

parameters.name: image
parameters.description: The image to draw.

parameters.name: left
parameters.description: The left coordinate of the region, relative to the origin of this element.

parameters.name: top
parameters.description: The top coordinate of the region, relative to the origin of this element.

parameters.name: width
parameters.description: The width in pixels. If provided, the image is stretched or shrunk to fit. If omitted, uses the original image width.

parameters.name: height
parameters.description: The height in pixels. If provided, the image is stretched or shrunk to fit. If omitted, uses the original image height.

methods.name: drawOSControl
methods.description: Draw the platform-specific control associated with this element.

methods.name: drawString
methods.description: Draw a string of text starting at a given point in this element, using a given drawing pen and font.

parameters.description: The text string.

parameters.name: pen
parameters.description: The drawing pen to use.

parameters.name: x

parameters.name: y
parameters.description: The top coordinate, relative to the origin of this element.
